mapper.sql: select project_id, project_name, project_zck_id, asset_status, no, borrower, city, loan_bank, contract_principal, principal_balance, interest_balance, principal_interest_balance, guarantor, pledge, collateral, project_manager_id, project_manager, user_id, judicial_status, competent_court, judge_contact, judicial_remarks, collateral_claims, transaction_type, buyer, buyer_id, buyer_sources, buyer_contact, contract_no, limitation_action, seal_up_subject_matter, seal_up_date, limitation_execution, date_filing, first_instance, second_instance, retrial, enforcement_filing_date, appraisal_report_date, first_shot_date, second_shot_date, sell_shot_date, successful_bidder_date, payment_received_date, del_flag, parent_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, project_zck_id, law_firm, lawyer_contact, debt_status, potential_customers, potential_customers_id, seizure, ageing, limitation , deal_customer_id, deal_customer_name, customer_lable, asset_supplier_id, asset_supplier_name, funding_provider_id, funding_provider_name, lawyer_id, lawyer_name, intermediary_id, intermediary_name, wqyx_customer_id, wqyx_customer_name, wqcj_customer_id, wqcj_customer_name, zqyx_customer_id, zqyx_customer_name, zqcj_customer_id, zqcj_customer_name, other_id, other_name, other_flag, open_time, lawsuit, sue from sys_project
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_project
project_name, asset_status, no, borrower, city, loan_bank, contract_principal, principal_balance, interest_balance, principal_interest_balance, guarantor, pledge, collateral, project_manager_id, project_manager, user_id, judicial_status, competent_court, judge_contact, judicial_remarks, collateral_claims, transaction_type, buyer, buyer_id, buyer_sources, buyer_contact, contract_no, limitation_action, seal_up_subject_matter, seal_up_date, limitation_execution, date_filing, first_instance, second_instance, retrial, enforcement_filing_date, appraisal_report_date, first_shot_date, second_shot_date, sell_shot_date, successful_bidder_date, payment_received_date, del_flag, parent_id, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, project_zck_id, lawyer_contact, law_firm, debt_status, potential_customers, potential_customers_id, seizure, ageing, limitation, deal_customer_id, deal_customer_name, customer_lable, asset_supplier_id, asset_supplier_name, funding_provider_id, funding_provider_name, lawyer_id, lawyer_name, intermediary_id, intermediary_name, wqyx_customer_id, wqyx_customer_name, wqcj_customer_id, wqcj_customer_name, zqyx_customer_id, zqyx_customer_name, zqcj_customer_id, zqcj_customer_name, other_id, other_name, other_flag, open_time, sue, lawsuit,
#{projectName}, #{assetStatus}, #{no}, #{borrower}, #{city}, #{loanBank}, #{contractPrincipal}, #{principalBalance}, #{interestBalance}, #{principalInterestBalance}, #{guarantor}, #{pledge}, #{collateral}, #{projectManagerId}, #{projectManager}, #{userId}, #{judicialStatus}, #{competentCourt}, #{judgeContact}, #{judicialRemarks}, #{collateralClaims}, #{transactionType}, #{buyer}, #{buyerId}, #{buyerSources}, #{buyerContact}, #{contractNo}, #{limitationAction}, #{sealUpSubjectMatter}, #{sealUpDate}, #{limitationExecution}, #{dateFiling}, #{firstInstance}, #{secondInstance}, #{retrial}, #{enforcementFilingDate}, #{appraisalReportDate}, #{firstShotDate}, #{secondShotDate}, #{sellShotDate}, #{successfulBidderDate}, #{paymentReceivedDate}, #{delFlag}, #{parentId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime}, #{projectZckId}, #{lawyerContact}, #{lawFirm}, #{debtStatus}, #{potentialCustomers}, #{potentialCustomersId}, #{seizure}, #{ageing}, #{limitation}, #{dealCustomerId}, #{dealCustomerName}, #{customerLable}, #{assetSupplierId}, #{assetSupplierName}, #{fundingProviderId}, #{fundingProviderName}, #{lawyerId}, #{lawyerName}, #{intermediaryId}, #{intermediaryName}, #{wqyxCustomerId}, #{wqyxCustomerName}, #{wqcjCustomerId}, #{wqcjCustomerName}, #{zqyxCustomerId}, #{zqyxCustomerName}, #{zqcjCustomerId}, #{zqcjCustomerName}, #{otherId}, #{otherName}, #{otherFlag}, #{openTime}, #{sue}, #{lawsuit},
mapper.delete:
update sys_project set del_flag = '2' where project_id in
#{projectId}
mapper.select: SELECT project_id FROM (SELECT t1.project_id, IF(FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @pids) > 0, @pids := CONCAT(@pids, ',', project_id), 0) AS ischild, del_flag FROM (SELECT project_id, parent_id, del_flag FROM sys_project t ORDER BY parent_id, project_id) t1, (SELECT @pids := #{projectId}) t2) t3 WHERE ischild != 0 AND del_flag='0' OR project_id =#{projectId}

SELECT count(project_id) projectCount FROM sys_project
debt_status ='处置中' AND del_flag='0' and parent_id is NULL AND project_zck_id in ( SELECT project_zck_id FROM sys_project_zck WHERE del_flag='0' AND project_zck_type =#{project_zck_type})

SELECT SUM(principal_balance) as totalPrincipalBalance FROM sys_project WHERE del_flag = '0' AND project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM (SELECT t1.project_id, IF(FIND_IN_SET(parent_id, @pids) > 0, @pids := CONCAT(@pids, ',', project_id), 0) AS ischild, del_flag FROM (SELECT project_id, parent_id, del_flag FROM sys_project t ORDER BY parent_id, project_id) t1, (SELECT @pids := #{projectId}) t2) t3 WHERE ischild != 0 AND del_flag='0' OR project_id =#{projectId});
